settings.html:
<!-- Import the component -->
<script type="module" src="https://unpkg.com/@google/model-viewer/dist/model-viewer.min.js">
index-3d-model {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    width: 60%;
    height: 60%;
    margin: auto;
    --poster-color: transparent;
    animation: canvasModelFadeIn 1.8s ease-in-out 1;
    --progress-bar-color: transparent;
</script>

<!-- Use it like any other HTML element --> 
<center>
<model-viewer ar="" ar-modes="webxr scene-viewer quick-look" camera-controls="" touch-action="pan-y" src="https://filesonline.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/a3_logo_new.glb" alt="A 3D model A3 Logo" class="index-3d-model" auto-rotate="" rotation-per-second="70deg"> <button slot="ar-button" style="background-color: transparent; border-radius: 4px; border: none; position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;"> ACTIVATE AR </button> </model-viewer>
</center>
settings.title: A3 AR
